positions.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Created the front-end VueJS project from scratch along with one other developer.
Proposed and implemented typeography standards for front-end UI.
Developed front-end permission architecture using CASL(authorization JavaScript library)
Added new functionality and tooling to existing structures in the back-end ExpressJS project.
Deployed the front-end VueJS app to AWS S3/CloudFront.
Deployed the back-end ExpressJS app to AWS EKS.
Created build and deploy pipelines for front and back end using GitHub Actions.

positions.title: Software Development Intern
description: Standardized UI components across all modules of production software.
Worked on technical debt backlog, for continuous product improvement.
Wrote code parse/replacement script to refactor code base to allow for framework update.

positions.title: QA Automation Intern
description: Collaborated with the Quality Assurance team to develop automation testing steps.
Wrote test scripts using C# and selenium framework to validate front end and back end development efforts.

positions.title: Software Design Intern
description: Created low/high fidelity prototypes based on discovery and framing activities.
Actively participated in the iterative feedback loop, incorporating user feedback in designs.

awardsHonors.title: Powers-Knapp Scholarship Program
awardsHonors.description: An academic scholarship through the University of Wisconsin - Madison. Excellence in scholarship, leadership, and service is instilled in all scholars during the regular meetings and community service events throughout the student’s college career.
